seo.title: About SustainSage
seo.description: Meet the coaches behind SustainSage and learn how our ICF-aligned practice supports people building a life in the UK with consent and care.

hero.title: Thoughtful, ICF-aligned coaching for people building a life in the UK
hero.subtitle: We hold a calm, honest space so you can think clearly, not perform.
hero.imageAlt: Illustration of two people in a reflective conversation

clients.title: What clients often bring
items: “I’ve moved countries and I’m not sure who I am at work anymore.”
“On paper I’m fine, but my days don’t feel like they’re mine.”
“I’m juggling care, money, visas and expectations. I need to think.”

cards.title: Client-led
cards.body: You choose what matters. We follow your pace, not a script.

cards.title: Reflective & practical
cards.body: We slow down your thinking, then turn insight into small experiments.

cards.title: Ethics & care
cards.body: Working with ICF core competencies: confidentiality, respect, clear boundaries.

coaches.title: Your coaches
coaches.subtitle: Co-founders who have navigated cross-border careers and caregiving themselves.

cards.name: Hao-Cheng Tsai
cards.summary: Service designer and ICF coach supporting people translating values across systems and countries.

cards.name: Yi-Ling Lai
cards.summary: Learning facilitator and ICF coach holding multilingual, care-centred spaces for returners and leaders.

notNow.title: When coaching may not be right now
items: You’re in immediate crisis or at risk of harm.
You’re seeking diagnosis, medical, legal or immigration advice.
You want someone to tell you exactly what to do.

cta.title: Want to see if we’re a fit?
cta.body: Share a snapshot of your context. We’ll suggest next steps or signpost other support with no pressure.
cta.primaryAria: Book a 20-minute intro call with SustainSage
